item.title: The blog's internals
item.description: This article describes how the blog is generated and deployed. Static content generation To create the blog, I wanted an easy and lightweight solution to setup and deploy. For this reason, I renounced to use a content management system (CMS), such as Joomla or Wordpress, and I have chosen hugo, an open-source static site generator. For the user interface (UI), the blog is using the Coder theme. The theme is responsive and offers a light or a dark appearance.
